1. Clearwing tropical moths travel 4,500 miles from Guyana to Port Talbot  BBC.com
  2. Moth species found in Wales `travelled 4,500 miles from...  Daily Mail
  3. Moth species found in Wales had travelled from South American jungle  Sky News
  4. Tropical moths travel 4,500 miles in woman's bag  MSN
  5. A new species has been found in Wales thousands of miles from home  Yahoo News UK

item.title: Revolutionary Metal-Fueled Rockets Promise Infinite Space Journeys - SciTechDaily
item.description:
1. Revolutionary Metal-Fueled Rockets Promise Infinite Space Journeys  SciTechDaily

  3. Scientists begin testing space thruster that could boldly go where no one has gone before  MSN

  5. New rocket fuelled by burning metals ‘could lead to never-ending space exploration’  Irish Independent
